instanceWarmupPeriod.description: Period of time, in seconds, after a newly launched Amazon EC2 instance can contribute to CloudWatch metrics for Auto Scaling group. If this parameter is omitted, the default value of 300 seconds is used.

maximumScalingStepSize.description: Maximum step adjustment size. A number between 1 and 10,000.

minimumScalingStepSize.description: Minimum step adjustment size. A number between 1 and 10,000.

status.description: Whether auto scaling is managed by ECS. Valid values are `ENABLED` and `DISABLED`.

targetCapacity.description: Target utilization for the capacity provider. A number between 1 and 100.
